=== '''Harmonie System Training''' ===
= '''Hands On Practice: Authoring a wiki page''' =
[[Center(end)]]

== Examples of practice ==

 1. preparation
  * log in to system wiki; make sure that you obtain !HeXnet/wiki user id and password
    * access control is shared between system wiki, repository and rest of !HeXnet
  * learn to edit, check page history;
 1. edit the [wiki:HirlamDirectory/Alphabetical Hirlam directory page] to add or correct at least 2 entries
 1. add or edit one item of the HirlamSystemDocumentation or HarmonieSystemDocumentation pages, e.g.
   * [wiki:HirlamSystemDocumentation/Analysis/SYNOP/BGOS BGOS]
   * [wiki:HarmonieSystemDocumentation/DataAssimilation3DVAR Derivation of HIRLAM and HARMONIE background error statistics]
   * [wiki:HirlamSystemDocumentation/Analysis/OSI-SAF analysis OSI-SAF analysis]
 1. General Information about Operational Hirlam/Harmonie suite at HIRLAM services: model versions; domain;  resolution; run schedule; main futures about DA/forecast; deviation from reference system; information links; forecast and other online products links; publication and documentation links
   * AEMET [wiki:AEMET_HIRLAM HIRLAM] and [wiki:AEMET_HARMONIE HARMONIE]
   * DMI [wiki:DMI_HIRLAM HIRLAM] and [wiki:DMI_HARMONIE HARMONIE]
   * FMI [wiki:FMI_HIRLAM HIRLAM] and [wiki:FMI_HARMONIE HARMONIE]
   * KNMI [wiki:KNMI_HIRLAM HIRLAM] and [wiki:KNMI_HARMONIE HARMONIE]
   * MetIreann [wiki:METIE_HIRLAM HIRLAM] and [wiki:METIE_HARMONIE HARMONIE]
   * met.no [wiki:metno_HIRLAM HIRLAM] and [wiki:metno_HARMONIE HARMONIE]
   * SMHI [wiki:SMHI_HIRLAM HIRLAM] and [wiki:SMHI_HARMONIE HARMONIE]
